items.name: Edo Renaissance Gallery
items.short_description: A vibrant space showcasing contemporary Edo art, blending traditional bronze casting and textile designs with modern abstract expressions. It's a testament to Benin's enduring artistic spirit.
items.address: 15 Oba Market Road, Benin City, Edo State

items.name: Ogba Riverfront Eco-Park
items.short_description: An expansion of the famous Ogba Zoo, this new section features boardwalks through wetlands, bird-watching hides, and picnic spots along the Ogba River. A perfect escape into nature.
items.address: Off Airport Road, Benin City, Edo State

items.name: Benin Food Haven & Culinary Workshops
items.short_description: A modern, bustling market and food court celebrating Edo's rich culinary heritage. Enjoy authentic local dishes, fresh produce, and participate in hands-on cooking classes.
items.address: 7 Sapele Road, Benin City, Edo State

items.name: Oba's Grand Theatre & Cultural Centre
items.short_description: A state-of-the-art facility dedicated to preserving and showcasing Edo cultural performances, from traditional dances to contemporary plays and musical concerts.
items.address: 12 Ring Road, Benin City, Edo State

items.name: Royal Legacy Museum & Interactive History Hub
items.short_description: Step back in time with cutting-edge augmented reality and immersive exhibits, exploring the glorious history of the Benin Empire, its intricate art, and powerful monarchs.
items.address: Museum Street, Off Airport Road, Benin City, Edo State

items.name: Benin Funzone Arena
items.short_description: The ultimate family entertainment destination, featuring a multi-level soft play area, state-of-the-art arcade games, virtual reality experiences, and a mini-golf course.
items.address: 18 Adesuwa Road, GRA, Benin City, Edo State

items.name: The Bronze Canvas Hotel & Cultural Retreat
items.short_description: A luxurious boutique hotel offering modern comforts with a deep appreciation for Edo artistry. Enjoy exquisite dining, serene suites, and exclusive workshops on traditional crafts.
items.address: Plot 4, Reservation Road, GRA, Benin City, Edo State

items.name: Edo Tech & Creatives Hub (Public Wing)
items.short_description: A dynamic space fostering innovation and artistic collaboration. Its public wing features a modern co-working cafe, exhibition space for local tech/art projects, and regular workshops.
items.address: 27 Airport Road, Benin City, Edo State

items.name: Legacy Crafts Village & Artisan Workshops
items.short_description: Experience the revival of traditional Edo crafts. Watch skilled artisans create stunning bronze castings, intricate carvings, and vibrant textiles, and even try your hand at a workshop.
items.address: Ugbowo-Lagos Road, Benin City, Edo State

items.name: Horizon Rooftop Lounge & Sky Bar
items.short_description: Enjoy panoramic views of Benin City from this chic rooftop lounge. Offering craft cocktails, gourmet small bites, and a sophisticated ambiance, it's the perfect spot for an evening unwind.
items.address: 5 Oko Central Road, Benin City, Edo State
